path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Bitbook Staking Smart Contracts Audit Report V2- QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Unprotected Use of Block Gas Limit
findings.description: The contract uses a fixed block gas limit without proper handling, which can cause issues when the actual gas limit is higher or lower than expected.

findings.title: State Variable Default Visibility
findings.description: The default visibility of state variables is internal. However, it should be explicitly defined.
